tool_description: Enhances image sharpness using various filtering techniques to improve clarity for object detection annotation, with automatic and manual enhancement modes.

image_paths.description: List of image file paths to enhance

enhancement_method.description: Enhancement method: unsharp_mask, laplacian, high_pass, adaptive

output_directory.description: Directory path where enhanced images will be saved

error_messages: Invalid image path: One or more image paths do not exist or are not accessible.
Invalid enhancement method: Must be one of [unsharp_mask, laplacian, high_pass, adaptive].
Invalid strength value: strength must be a number between 0.1 and 3.0.
Output directory error: Output directory does not exist or is not writable.
Enhancement failed: Unable to enhance image due to corruption or processing error.
usage: Provide image_paths, enhancement_method, and output_directory. Optionally adjust strength parameter to control enhancement intensity. Tool applies the specified sharpening method to all images.

enhanced_paths.description: List of output file paths for successfully enhanced images

sharpness_improvements.description: Array of sharpness improvement scores for each enhanced image

failed_enhancements.description: List of images that failed enhancement

average_improvement.description: Average sharpness improvement across all successfully enhanced images
